IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDescription: The Jewish Community Center of Richmond exists to strengthen Jewish identity by enriching personal, cultural, social and physical development, by fostering leadership and promoting the welfare of both the Jewish Community and the community as a whole.
IRS990.MissionDescription: The Jewish Community Center of Richmond exists to strengthen Jewish identity by enriching personal, cultural, social and physical development, by fostering leadership and promoting the welfare of both the Jewish Community and the community as a whole.
IRS990.Description: Dora Lewis Program: Educational and daycare program stressing physical, social, and emotional growth

Activity2.Description: Physical education and aquatics: Provides a variety of physical education activities for different age groups

ActivityOther.Description: Camp Hilbert and JCC West Summer camp for children
Adult service: Provides a wide range of activities for adult participation and enjoyment

OtherSecurities.Description: Pooled Investments with the Richmond Jewish Foundation

Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.ReturnReference: Description of Intended Use of Endowment Funds:
Form990ScheduleDPartXIV.Explanation: The Center's investments include eight individual donor-restricted funds established for a variety of reasons.

IRS990ScheduleG.GamingManagerServicesProvided: His duties are to oversee the entirety of the gaming activities and to coordinate the running of each game to include volunteers, supply inventory, and oversee the facility. Mr. Lapkin is a volunteer.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 11
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The budget and finance committee reviewed Form 990 prior to filing.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 12c
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The conflict of interest policy is reviewed annually with the members of the board.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, line 15a
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: The compensation of the Executive Director is approved by the board.

GeneralExplanation.Identifier: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, line 19
GeneralExplanation.Explanation: Governing documents, conflict of interest policy, and financial statements are available upon request at our Business Office.
